rooms.description: Wide entrance with a reception area incorporating traditional Indian decorative motifs and Vastu-aligned positioning for auspicious entry.
Spacious open-plan living area adjoining the kitchen, designed with Art Deco motifs and natural lighting; placed in the east as per Vastu for positive energy.
Modern open-plan kitchen with integrated dining area, designed for ease of movement and equipped with Art Deco fixtures. Adjacent to the living area.
Master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony overlooking the garden, designed in Art Deco style with geometric patterns. Includes an en-suite bathroom.
Private bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom; Vastu considerations applied for privacy and natural light.
Small utility room for storage of cleaning supplies, located in a corner to maintain energy flow per Vastu principles.

openings.description: Primary entrance facing east, in line with Vastu to invite prosperity and good energy.
Balconies for the master bedroom on the north side ensuring adequate sunlight while maintaining privacy.
Large window opening that overlooks a landscaped garden, enhancing indoor-outdoor connection and natural ventilation.
